game.name: Animal Olympics - Weight Lifting
game.description:
Do you love to see animals performing different kinds of weight lifting moves? Join Animal Olympics - Weight Lifting and get an opportunity to meet with the animals which are capable enough of lifting the heaviest weight! In this brand new Olympics sports, you will have to help the bull to lift the best weight of his life. Give him the confidence and show him the right direction to lift the heaviest possible weight in just 3 attempts. The crowd is screaming and everyone wants to know if you attempt it or surrender.
 
Control a bull and have fun in unlimited amount in this brand new weightlifting sports game for boys. Start this game by helping the bull to lift 100 kg. The torso of the bull will start showing the dots once it grabs the barbell. You will be able then to see a power gauge on the right side of the screen. In order to activate the muscles of the bull, you are advised to click the dots rapidly. This will also help to increase its power that encourages it to lift the barbell. It will be collapsed if it fails to lift the barbell and your try will go into vain.

You are suggested to select the weight that you want to try before the next attempt comes into existence. Check out how many attempts you have made yet along with the respective weight right at the top left corner of the screen. The best weight your bull has lifted up will be shown at the right side of the screen. This free online sports game will be completed when your all attempts are finished. The good performance of the bull claims to receive a medal in the end. Unleash its hidden power and help the bull to become the greatest lifter of all the time in this cool game!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP CLICK RED DOT TO LIFT THE WEIGHT
